analyzed: suddhim a suddhim ti a patthayānaḥ

original: Atha vāpi diṭṭhaṁ va sutaṁ mutaṁ vā;
analyzed: atha vā api diṭṭham sutam mutam vā
a vīta taṇhā se bhava abhavesu

original: Sa kena vedheyya kuhiṁ va jappe”.
analyzed: sa kena vedheyya kuhim va jappe
tam eva hīnan ti pana āhu aññe
sabbe iva hi ime kusala avadānā
sakam sakam sammutim āhuḥ sat ca
saddhamma pūjā api na īsam tathā iva
suddhī hi na isam paccattam eva

original: Na hi tena suddhiṁ kusalā vadanti.
analyzed: na hi tena suddhim kusalāḥ vadanti
na diṭṭhi sārī na pi ñāṇa bandhu
na lippati loke a natta garahī

original: Yaṁ kiñci diṭṭhaṁ va sutaṁ mutaṁ vā;
analyzed: yam kiñci diṭṭham vā sutam mutam vā
na kappiyaḥ nu uparataḥ na patthiyaḥ ti
